description.introduction: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that provides low-level utility classes to build custom designs without leaving your HTML. Utility-first means it offers a wide range of single-purpose classes that can be composed together to create complex designs directly in the markup.
description.used_where: I have not used Tailwind CSS professionally, but I use it on side projects. In fact, I used it to style this very website, including the components and layout currently being displayed.
